beer.beer_description:
Neuralink is a fully exotic, topped-up-to-the-brim kettle sour that's been given our full Liquid Cream Treatment™. If you love crazy exotic fruit, beer, good times, and ice-cream, then this one is for you, fam.
We’ve sourced that obscure good stuff this time, using obscene amounts of Cashew Apple, a reddish-yellow fruit native to Brazil, which many liken to a blend of cucumbers, strawberries, mangoes, and bell pepper. Hectic.

items.badge_description: Happy Sour Beer Day! September 20th marks the refreshing beginning of Sour Beer Day 2025, ripe for celebration! No need to sugarcoat it, these tart treats aren’t for everyone, but that’s just fine with sour lovers like us. Let us berry the hatchet and squeeze the day! Follow @untappd and drop a comment with your favorite sour!

items.checkin_comment: Does what or says, thick ice cream. Fruity, tart

user.bio: Long-established beer drinker, neophile. Cicerone Certified Beer Server, BJCP Certified. Potentially Certifiable.

beer.beer_description:
Neuralink is a fully exotic, topped-up-to-the-brim kettle sour that's been given our full Liquid Cream Treatment™. If you love crazy exotic fruit, beer, good times, and ice-cream, then this one is for you, fam.

user.bio:
Japanese
I love West Coast IPA and Stout

items.checkin_comment: 20250812，三个半月开封，66人民币/440ml。一滴新花样总归要买来尝尝。麦芽和腰果味道混合在水果调味中却不带来油腻感确实可圈可点。但毕竟是实验款，对非坚果狂热爱好者而言，尝鲜不踩雷，复购不必要。

items.badge_description: Hold on to your beers, unleash your inner paleontologist, and celebrate Untappd's 2025 Mid-Year in Beer presented by the Untappd Shop with this limited-edition badge. Now through July 18, get 50% OFF your first year of Insiders: GET THE DEAL

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 385 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 78! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: can see in 12D, lives in Beijing
Lambic for tasting, pilsner for routine and saison for life.

items.checkin_comment: 凑近了闻芒果和香蕉的香味儿，入口香蕉的丝滑加上芒果的微酸微甜，回味有点香草冰淇淋的感觉，整体喝下来果酸混着香甜，但是又不腻，几乎没啥酒精感，属于小甜水里中规中矩的

That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 10! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 40 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 9! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Cheers Daryl H.  My favourite brewery. Gotta get there

items.comment: Kym C. Nice! And it’s a sour - I didn’t think u liked sours?
Greg J. This was very different Doctor. I'd have it again anytime. If you get back to Sydney again we'll have to go there as part of a longer brewery  crawl

items.checkin_comment: Birthday Beer 1/4 - this is a milkshake masquerading as a beer. No head, just milk froth… still kinda good

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 140 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 29. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 155 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 32!
It's been a year since your last birthday on Untappd? Whoa - time flies! Happy birthday to you from all of us at Untappd!
